images.title: Neil Kennedy / Trelissick Garden, A Welcome Rest.
images.caption: A Welcome Rest. Like all National Trust Gardens, Trelissick needs a lot of stamina to get round - and this couple are taking a well earned rest.

description: Explore the beautiful 300-acre estate of this National Trust run country house in Cornwall. The estate is located on the estuary of the River Fal with a trail running through woodlands alongside the river. Trelissick also includes 30 acres of elevated garden with exotic plants, rhododendrons, flowers and huge towering trees.
